articles.title: Sue Barker regrets how BBC handled end to her time on Question of Sport - The Guardian
articles.description: Former host says broadcaster wanted her to say she was walking away when in fact it was ‘refreshing’ the format
articles.content:

articles.author: Meghan Mccain
articles.title: Trevor Noah is out after ruining The Daily Show: MEGHAN MCCAIN - Daily Mail
articles.description: MCCAIN: Noah got by on his 'cool kid' clout in the media. But generally, he just vomited up the same old tired, recycled jokes again and again.
articles.content:
Trevor Noah is out as host of The Daily Show.
It was a long time coming.
